title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.5 - Data to be declared
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.5 - Data to be declared

State Regulations

All statements of partnerships, of sales with
contingencies, of leases or of arrangements shall declare to whom winnings are
payable (which must be the name of the nominator), in whose name the horse will
run and with whom rests the power of entry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
